title: Checking in on the Chickens in their New Coop

tasks.task: Cleaning and managing the chicken coop.
subtasks: Checking the smell in the coop.
Adding carbon (hay) to reduce unpleasant odors.
Allowing chickens to spread out the hay.
Monitoring chickens' feeding and bedding habits.
Managing nest boxes for egg collection.
Collecting eggs and closing the coop at the end of the day.
Ensuring chickens do not access upper nest boxes during the day.

tasks.task: Providing fresh hay for the chickens.
subtasks: Updating the birds on their favorite pastures.
Allowing chickens to eat the hay for nutrition.
Offering oyster shells for calcium supplementation.

tasks.task: Maintaining the ducks in the coop.
subtasks: Observing the ducks' activities and water consumption.
Addressing the increased water usage by the ducks.
Anticipating the return of pig meat.
Calculating the feed and butcher costs.
Tracking financial inputs for feeding the animals.
